Archive

1950—1959 • 1960—1969 • 1970—1979 • 1980—1989 • 1990—1999 • 2000—2009 • 2010—2019

1950’s

This material is available thanks to a donation of five bound volumes by Colin Smythe. Funding to digitise the volumes was generously provided by the TCD Assocation and Trust and the Publications Committee and carried out by Glenbeigh Records Management.

  1. Volume 1, 1953—1954

    Issue 1
    Michaelmas Term, 1963

    Edited by John Smith

  2. Volume 1, 1954—1954

    Issue 2
    Hilary Term, 1954

    Edited by John Smith

  3. Volume 1, 1954—1954

    Issue 3
    Trinity Term, 1954

    Edited by John Smith

  4. Volume 2, 1954—1955

    Issue 1
    Michaelmas Term, 1954

    Edited by David Zucker

  5. Volume 2, 1954—1955

    Issue 2
    Hilary Term, 1955

    Edited by David Zucker

  6. Volume 2, 1954—1955

    Issue 3
    Trinity Term, 1955

    Edited by David Zucker

1980’s

This material is available thanks to a donation of five bound volumes by Colin Smythe. Funding to digitise the volumes was generously provided by the TCD Assocation and Trust and the Publications Committee and carried out by Glenbeigh Records Management.

Missing issues

Our collection of issues covering the 1980's is incomplete. If you were involved in Trinity News at the time and have retained any physical issues, please get in contact at info@trinitynewsarchive.ie to help us complete the archive.

  1. Issue 1, Volume 1, 1953—1954

    Michaelmas Term, 1963 • Edited by John Smith

  2. Issue 2, Volume 1, 1954—1954

    Hilary Term, 1954 • Edited by John Smith

  3. Issue 3, Volume 1, 1954—1954

    Trinity Term, 1954 • Edited by John Smith

  4. Issue 1, Volume 2, 1954—1955

    Michaelmas Term, 1954 • Edited by David Zucker

  5. Issue 2, Volume 2, 1954—1955

    Hilary Term, 1955 • Edited by David Zucker

  6. Issue 3, Volume 2, 1954—1955

    Trinity Term, 1955 • Edited by David Zucker

For more information, please contact info@trinitynewsarchive.ie
